methods.name: focusedWindow
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get the currently focused window
- Returns: The focused window, or nil if none

returns.description: The focused window, or nil if none

methods.name: allWindows
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get all windows from all applications
- Returns: An array of all windows
methods.description: Get all windows from all applications

methods.name: visibleWindows
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get all visible (not minimized) windows
- Returns: An array of visible windows

methods.name: windowsForApp
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get windows for a specific application
- Parameter app: An HSApplication object
- Returns: An array of windows for that application
methods.description: Get windows for a specific application

returns.description: An array of windows for that application

methods.name: windowsOnScreen
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get all windows on a specific screen
- Parameter screenIndex: The screen index (0 for main screen)
- Returns: An array of windows on that screen
methods.description: Get all windows on a specific screen

returns.description: An array of windows on that screen

methods.name: windowAtPoint
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get the window at a specific screen position
- Parameters:
- point: An HSPoint containing the coordinates
- Returns: The topmost window at that position, or nil if none
methods.description: Get the window at a specific screen position

returns.description: The topmost window at that position, or nil if none

methods.name: orderedWindows
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get ordered windows (front to back)
- Returns: An array of windows in z-order

returns.description: An array of windows in z-order

methods.name: focus
methods.rawDocumentation:
Focus this window
- Returns: true if successful

methods.name: minimize
methods.rawDocumentation:
Minimize this window
- Returns: true if successful

methods.name: unminimize
methods.rawDocumentation:
Unminimize this window
- Returns: true if successful

methods.name: raise
methods.rawDocumentation:
Raise this window to the front
- Returns: true if successful
methods.description: Raise this window to the front

methods.name: toggleFullscreen
methods.rawDocumentation:
Toggle fullscreen mode
- Returns: true if successful

methods.name: close
methods.rawDocumentation:
Close this window
- Returns: true if successful

methods.name: centerOnScreen
methods.rawDocumentation:
Center the window on the screen
- Returns: true if successful
methods.description: Center the window on the screen

methods.name: axElement
methods.rawDocumentation:
Get the underlying AXElement
- Returns: The accessibility element for this window

returns.description: The accessibility element for this window

properties.name: application
properties.rawDocumentation: The application that owns this window
properties.description: The application that owns this window

properties.name: pid
properties.rawDocumentation: The process ID of the application that owns this window
properties.description: The process ID of the application that owns this window

properties.name: isVisible
properties.rawDocumentation: Whether the window is visible (not minimized or hidden)
properties.description: Whether the window is visible (not minimized or hidden)

properties.name: isStandard
properties.rawDocumentation: Whether the window is standard (has a titlebar)
properties.description: Whether the window is standard (has a titlebar)

properties.name: position
properties.rawDocumentation: The window's position on screen {x: Int, y: Int}
properties.description: The window's position on screen {x: Int, y: Int}

properties.name: size
properties.rawDocumentation: The window's size {w: Int, h: Int}
properties.description: The window's size {w: Int, h: Int}

properties.name: frame
properties.rawDocumentation: The window's frame {x: Int, y: Int, w: Int, h: Int}
properties.description: The window's frame {x: Int, y: Int, w: Int, h: Int}
